Plot: Within a small country town, people are disappearing without a trace. It's up to one big city detective to discover if they're simply runaways or if there's something much more sinister at work.
Title: Catch of the Day
Writer: Steven Della Salla, Jason Leavy (story), Michael Leavy
Actors: Gilbrando Acevedo, Krista Ayne, Ed Heavey, Boomer Tibbs
